text:
| Term                        | Definition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|:----------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Authority                   | Means the National Database and Registration Authority established under Section 3 of the NADRA Ordinance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ID Card Holders             | Any person eligible who holds any identity card issued under the NADRA Ordinance 2000                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| Citizen                     | A person who is or is deemed to be a citizen of Pakistan, under the Pakistan Citizenship Act, 1951                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| Citizen Database            | A multi-purpose database established under Section 7 of the NADRA Ordinance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Foreigner                   | Means a person who is not a citizen.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| National Database Warehouse | Is the Central data warehouse, based on the data and information extracted from the Citizen Database as its first and foremost basic input and any or all other data or information contained in the systems of registration or databases, data warehouses, networking, interfacing, and related facilities and services established or maintained by it. (Section 7(c) of NADRA Ordinance 2000)                                                                                 |
| Registrar General           | Registrar General of Pakistan is the Chairman of NADRA and is responsible for the registration of persons and things in Pakistan. (Section 3(3) of NADRA Ordinance 2000)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Registration Officer        | Means the Director General or a Director or Deputy Director or Assistant Director or District Registrar or Registrar or Inspector, appointed or deemed to have been appointed under section 35 and includes, subject to and for the purposes of section 37, any person to whom the powers of any such officer are delegated or deemed to have been delegated under the NADRA Ordinance.                                                                                          |
| Thing or Things             | Includes all animate or inanimate things, plants, animals, objects, substances, items, concepts, ideas, laws, customs, qualities, signs, symbols, circumstances, affairs, events, acts, deeds, works, transactions, documents, pieces of movable or immovable property, tangible or intangible property, rights, privileges, duties, entities, living or non-living beings other than a human being, and anything that can be possessed, or explained, whether known or unknown. |
| Verification Board          | A board of officers established for the purpose of ascertaining eligibility of the applicant.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| System Independent          | An individual either ID cardholder or otherwise, who has no blood or immediate relative information in the database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
